memberdef.name: AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS
memberdef.initializer: static_assert(false,"Wrong number of arguments to macro")

memberdef.name: AMREX_LAUNCH_DEVICE_LAMBDA
memberdef.initializer: AMREX_GET_MACRO(__VA_ARGS__,\ AMREX_GPU_LAUNCH_DEVICE_LAMBDA_RANGE_3, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_GPU_LAUNCH_DEVICE_LAMBDA_RANGE_2, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_GPU_LAUNCH_DEVICE_LAMBDA_RANGE, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS)(__VA_ARGS__)

memberdef.name: AMREX_LAUNCH_HOST_DEVICE_LAMBDA
memberdef.initializer: AMREX_GET_MACRO(__VA_ARGS__,\ AMREX_GPU_LAUNCH_HOST_DEVICE_LAMBDA_RANGE_3, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_GPU_LAUNCH_HOST_DEVICE_LAMBDA_RANGE_2, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_GPU_LAUNCH_HOST_DEVICE_LAMBDA_RANGE, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS, \ AMREX_WRONG_NUM_ARGS)(__VA_ARGS__)
